How many people are affected by isobutyryl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency ?,IBD deficiency is a rare disorder; approximately 22 cases have been reported in the medical literature.,GHR,isobutyryl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency
What are the genetic changes related to isobutyryl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency ?,"Mutations in the ACAD8 gene cause IBD deficiency. This gene provides instructions for making the IBD enzyme,
